entry.title: Termux
entry.summary: Termux-Milimal-Setup Installation Install termux Emulator Update and Upgrade packages apt-get update && apt-get upgrade ZSH Installation Run apt install ZSH Creating .zshrc File Configure zsh in .zshrc File nano .zshrc Paste this configuration for saving commands history # History in cache directory: HISTSIZE=10000 SAVEHIST=10000...

entry.title: Getting Started
entry.summary: Prerequisites Follow the instructions in the Jekyll Docs to complete the installation of Ruby, RubyGems, Jekyll, and Bundler. In addition, Git is also required to be installed. Installation Creating a New Site
